features: Regular fit is just right: Not too tight or too baggy
Dryride Mist-Defy DWR fabric repels water while staying soft and comfortable; PFC-free DWR coating
Three-in-one warmth system features a front zippered Coaches jacket and a zip-out Oak fleece hoodie
Open hand-warmer pockets with Coaches jacket and kangaroo hand-warmer pockets on fleece
Bluesign® approved materials use only safe chemicals and reduce impact on both humans and the planet during manufacturing
